Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394222) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394222)
